 Returns the state at which this subsytem should be loaded.
virtual void OnPowerDown ()
 This method is invoked on system power down to allow the USB subsytem to deinitialize itself.
virtual void OnPowerUp ()
 This method is invoked on system power on to allow the USB subsytem to initialize itself.

 Destructor.

Static Public Member Functions

static UsbSubSystem * GetInstance ()
 Operations returns the instance of usb subsystem.

Detailed Description

Since no application interacts directly with USB, the USB add-on is subsytem that gets loaded on power on.
